concept.title: VISA PIN algorithms
concept.shortdesc: The VISA PIN verification algorithm performs a multiple encipherment of a value, called the transformed security parameter (TSP), and a extraction of a 4-digit PIN verification value (PVV) from the ciphertext.

conbody.p: The calculated PVV is compared with the referenced PVV and stored on the plastic card or data base. If they match, verification is successful.
